meanings.definition: A bodily organ or duct that removes waste products from the body.
meanings.sent1: The emunctory efficiently eliminates toxins from the body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the function of the emunctory in the digestive system.
meanings.sent3: The emunctory decided to take a vacation and caused a backup of waste.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an emunctory, clearing out all negativity from her life.
meanings.sent5: The emunctory worked tirelessly, like a dedicated janitor, keeping the body clean.

meanings.sent1: She used an emunctory herbal tea to detoxify her body.
meanings.sent2: The emunctory properties of the soap left her skin feeling refreshed.
meanings.sent3: The emunctory scent of the flowers filled the room with a sense of cleanliness.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as an emunctory, washing away any doubts she had.
meanings.sent5: The emunctory ritual was a soothing way to start the day, feeling purified and renewed.
